remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a projective subspace sum.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
paddass.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddass.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
padd4N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A ) /\ ( Z C_ A /\ W C_ A ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ ( Z .+ W ) ) = ( ( X .+ Z ) .+ ( Y .+ W ) ) ) $.
